programme.title: Space Channel Universe- all around our social space.
programme.desc: Join us alongside Sabree Edwards for a trip around the Space Channel Universe, bringing you News, Movies, Music, Original Series & so much more! Duration: 3600

programme.title: SC Movie: The Queen of Blood
programme.desc: The year is 1990. An alien species makes contact with Earth through radio transmission. An alien ship crash lands on Mars, and a rescue team is sent from Earth. Eventually a surviving female is located and brought on-board the Earth ship. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Capricorn 1
programme.desc: When the first manned flight to Mars is deemed unsafe and scrubbed on the launch pad, authorities must scramble to save face and retain their funding. So an unthinkable plot to fake the mission is hatched. Duration: 9000

programme.title: Space Channel - Cinespace Music
programme.desc: Space and music go so well together.....these Cinespace movies prove our point. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Capricorn 1
programme.desc: When the first manned flight to Mars is deemed unsafe and scrubbed on the launch pad, authorities must scramble to save face and retain their funding. So an unthinkable plot to fake the mission is hatched. Duration: 9000

programme.title: Space Channel News Starbase Update...and more
programme.desc: Space Channel News with continuing coverage of the SpaceX Starship program. Duration: 1800

programme.title: SC Movie: The Queen of Blood
programme.desc: The year is 1990. An alien species makes contact with Earth through radio transmission. An alien ship crash lands on Mars, and a rescue team is sent from Earth. Eventually a surviving female is located and brought on-board the Earth ship. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: News from around the space industry, around the globe....and so much more. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel's Captain's Lounge
programme.desc: A journey through space and time to discover the truth in all things, and our connection and rhythm with the Cosmos Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Force of Impact
programme.desc: he sky is literally falling in this thriller. As one of the nation's leading astronomers, Madison Kelsey believes she is tracking a huge rogue asteroid rocketing toward earth. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Monolith Monsters
programme.desc: Rocks from a meteor grows and threatens a sleepy Southwestern desert community. It must be stopped or Los Angeles is in big trouble! Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Tourist - Going to space!
programme.desc: Sabree Edwards hosts from the Columbia Memorial Space Center in Downey, California. He takes us for an inside look at Virgin Galactic's facilities in New Mexico as well as what you can expect if you ride on Blue Origin or want to watch a launch in Florida. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Astronaut: The Last Push
programme.desc: A tragic accident cuts short the first manned mission to explore life on the moons of Jupiter. Michael Forrest must make the 3 year journey home to Earth in pure solitude. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movies- Its a dangerous universe!
programme.desc: The Boogies, SkyFighter and Caronte show that space is a dangerous place. Especially when it lands on the ground. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Shorts
programme.desc: In Cradle, Eade and her dad are on the return journey to earth when an explosion cripples the craft and seriously injures her father. In New Mars, a generation lives underground on Mars preparing to begin a new life as the colonists of a planet which is being terraformed into a new habitable world. Finally, Kaya Torres is circling a black hole in a pod. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Presents| Cinespace Movie Special
programme.desc: We have more inspirational and thought provoking films from around the world coming up with the best of Cinespace! In 2015, Houston Cinema Arts Society and NASA began bridging the gap of space and art by way of film. They created CineSpace to promote the creative exploration of the vast NASA archive, inviting filmmakers from around the world to showcase that footage in their masterpieces. It’s exciting watching the space industry evolve in real time, and we get to see the creative perspective of this aerospace revolution Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Astronaut: The Last Push
programme.desc: A tragic accident cuts short the first manned mission to explore life on the moons of Jupiter. Michael Forrest must make the 3 year journey home to Earth in pure solitude. Duration: 7200
